channel.title: 2007 Jad?
channel.description: Hey, I apologize about this thread.. I know it's one of those annoying threads but I wasn't too sure where to ask apart from on this forum.. (& sorry if this is the wrong sub category) Does anyone know of a server online/downloadable that I can try only jad with preferably healers? I used to do fire capes, I got some people on this forum some funnily enough but I haven't done it in quite a while and I want to get back into it. I'd rather not waste money on supplies and time. If you know of a rsps that has the Jad i'm looking for and it's a newer revision, if it's similar to Rs Jad then please let me know about it! Thanks for reading my thread. E

item.title: 2007 Jad?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Loveandpower:

You can try reminiscentx they had a fully playable jad (its the newer one but it’s the same concept)

Thanks for the info. I’ll check it out.

JavaTC:

Don’t they have Jad tutorials?

Posts like this are absolute trash, I get frustrated when people post like this on my threads. At least read the OP if your going to make a comment like this. I know how to do Jad so how would a guide help me? Doing Jad and knowing how to do Jad are two different things. Getting overly nervous etc, making small mistakes is what makes most people fail; despite the fact that I have done many capes since I have not it in a while I feel like I will make a stupid mistake so if I do it on a RSPS no big deal.

Read full topic

item.title: 2007 Jad?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

asshole_rule:

or you can download one with it/make it yourself

Not sure which one has it, if any hence why I’m asking.
Too much effort, I’d need to fully understand the timers etc, when the healers tend to heal Jad. What damage, accuracy (etc) should be like.

ox random xi:

lol, I thought you were one of new kids just registered but then I see who you are.

Lol, yeah. I felt like a ‘noob’ posting this thread but quite simply I don’t want to waste supplies failing two times and time (when I first learned how to do jad I failed like 3 times then on the fourth time I succeeded so, yeah), that’s like four hours ;x.

Read full topic

Does anyone know of a server online/downloadable that I can try only jad with preferably healers?
